impactText:
The 2014 edition of the particle data book has been published in august and is already widely referenced in publications from the sector.
The results and discoveries published under my guidance in ATLAS are in many cases the "last word" from the data collected by LHC experiments in 2011-2012, and as such have drawn the attention of the particle physics community and the general public. Education Cultural,Societal
findingsText:
Have contributed to the publication of the 2014 edition of the "bible of particle physics": the reference in the field when it comes to reviewed experimental results. I have also coordinated and supervised the publication of several analyses in the atlas experiment, including the discovery of a new particle (the Bc* meson). the Particle Data Book is a reference for experts in the sector, as well as physics students approaching particle physics for the first time.
The general public has paid increasingly attention to the results coming from the Large Hadron Collider, and the exciting scientific achievements from the ATLAS experiment. Education
